Description:
Represent client's interests by effectively identifying and communicating business goals and objectives, contractual and non-contractual expectations, deliverables, and other factors to internal team members.
Designated point-of-contact to manage and handle various clients and accounts and also focuses on fostering a relationship with the clients, preferably long term.
Discuss the doubts put forth by the clients to help them better and maintain a consistent client experience by assisting other employees working on the account of the same client.
Effectively answering client questions and guiding them throughout certain queries lies at the crux of an account manager's responsibilities. Also coordinate with other team members working on the same client account to promote consistency.Skills
Skills:
Ability to manage oversee and multiple tasks and activities.
Multi-tasking without compromising the quality of either job.
Flawless exchange of ideas during peer-to-peer communication and the ability to follow-up effectively.
Familiarization with business tracks, complemented by the initiative to steer a team effectively.
